cont.entity_a: Legendary sound quality with booming bass and great surround sound. Powerful and clear sound for computer speakers, suitable for gaming and movies. THX certified, providing excellent sound for its size. Sound quality is comparable to high-end brands like Bose at a lower price. Some minor issues with bass being too strong for certain music preferences.
cont.entity_b: Good sound quality for the size, suitable for small to medium-sized rooms. Lacks deep bass and may distort at high volumes.

cont.entity_b: Durable build, lasting up to 10 years for some users.

cont.entity_b: Offers good value for the price.
